ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates StrokeThickness, StrokeDashArray and PointMarker properties of a LineSeries which can be used to style a dashed or solid line with triangle markers
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates the FastLineRenderableSeries [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.RenderableSeries.FastLineRenderableSeries~StrokeDashArray.html']StrokeDashArray[/url], StrokeThickness and PointMarker properties which can be used to style a dashed or solid line with triangle markers.
The [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.RenderableSeries.FastLineRenderableSeries~StrokeDashArray.html']StrokeDashArray property[/url] accepts a double array similar to the [url='https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb980148(v=vs.95).aspx']WPF StrokeDashArray property[/url], and defines the length and spacing of dash strokes.
